ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Server GM email address
ygData.msgSnippet: At EQlive ( http://eqlive.station.sony.com ) there is a link off the main page where you can contact your server GM. Good luck though, I have been trying to
ygData.messageBody:
At EQlive ( http://eqlive.station.sony.com ) there is a link off the main
page where you can contact your server GM. Good luck though, I have been
trying to get a hold on Drinal's GM for 3 -THREE damn months over some nice
items that disappeared in the middle of a trade when I went LD...they don't
answer. :\

Lady Synthea Firestorm
43 Druidess
Sirens of the Storm ( http://www.geocities.com/syntheafirestorm )
Drinal Server



>From: "Nygaard, Jeff" <jeff.nygaard@...>
>Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [EverQuest] Server GM email adress
>Date: Mon, 20 May 2002 10:32:01 -0700
>
>Does anyone know a web site where I can get the email address of my servers
>Lead GM? I have a problem, the guide that helped was great a gave us as
>much
>information as she could and said she would pass it along to the GM. She
>instructed me to do a petition on Sunday through Thursday from 3 pm to 6 pm
>Pacific time. I did this yesterday and no real GM ever showed up and the
>guide that answered me yesterday was a guide and said I would have to keep
>trying. I would like to get his email address to start a dialog about the
>problem I have.
>
>Anyone know the web site or the Tunare Lead GM email address?
>
>
>
>
>Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>
>
>Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
